headline: Nepal Insurance Co. Limited has distributed its 1,92,574.00 units of unsold promoter right shares through an auction to the interested person, company, association/institutions on Ashwin 22, 2082 and the refund process for non-allottee's begins today, Ashwin 23, 2082 and the final cut-off price is as Rs.503.43
